title: a file input obect
description: Represents the collective fields needed to indicate an input file

href.description: Either a presignedGETURL OR a Creative Cloud assets path for storage='adobe'.

storage.description: Asset stored on an external service (like AWS S3, Azure, Dropbox) or Adobe's cloud.

actionName.description: If you only want to execute a particular action, you may specify whcih action to play from the ActionSet

input_objects_max_1: used when the inputs array can only contain one input object
input_objects_max_1.description: An input file to add or edit

input_objects: used when the inputs array can only contain N input objects
input_objects.description: An array of hashes describing the input files to edit. each input object will be either 'external', 'adobe', 'azure' or 'dropbox'

input_objects_action: used when the inputs array can only contain N input objects
input_objects_action.description: An array of hashes describing the input action files to edit. each input object will be either 'external', 'adobe', 'azure' or 'dropbox'

artboard_objects: used when the options array for artboard can only contain N input objects
artboard_objects.description: An array of hashes describing the input files to edit. each input object will be either 'external', 'adobe', 'azure' or 'dropbox'

input_object.description: An object describing an input file. Currently supported filetypes include:`jpeg`, `png`, `psd`, `tiff`

href.description: A URI representing the path to the input file
A string representing the path to the input CC Libraries file
A string representing the path to the input CC Storage file

input_object_action.description: An input action file to play. The input object will be either 'external', 'adobe', 'azure' or 'dropbox'

href.description: A URI representing the path to the input action file
A string representing the path to the input CC file
